about_the_game:
Note: This is a "Support the Devs Pack + Original Soundtrack" for The Test: Reality Check. This DLC does not affect in-game content.

Thank you so much for choosing to support us in our journey while rocking out to tasty jams! It really means the world to us and we appreciate you more than words can express! ♥

In this Supporter Pack / OST + Art Pack, explore an upbeat, yet relaxing musical experience sure to get your head and heart moving!

Featured within are songs from The Test: Reality Check + Bonus Songs for each Gifted Word!

We've also included original art found within the game!

(Music Files come in standard MP3 format with optional download of WAV.)

Special thanks to Randumb Studios & "A Beautiful Collection of Darkness".

(Joshua Benson, Amy Nguyen, Samantha Reed, Sven Brännström, Billy "The Brain" Bozeman, Erica Chavez, and Shamus O'Reiley.)

name: The Test: Reality Check Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 90 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 430 MB available space

short_description: In this Supporter Pack / OST + Art Pack, explore a relaxing, yet invigorating musical experience created by Randumb Studios and A Beautiful Collection of Darkness. Featured in this album are Musical Tracks for each Gifted Word + Original Art from The Test: Reality Check!
